tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE production_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  production_date DATE,
  production_cost DECIMAL,
  yield_percent DECIMAL,
  efficiency_percent DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE production_costs (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  cost DECIMAL,
  date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE yields (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  yield_percentage DECIMAL,
  product_name VARCHAR,
  date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE efficiency (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  efficiency_score DECIMAL,
  productivity DECIMAL,
  date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE performance_monitoring (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE,
    total_cost DECIMAL,
    total_yield DECIMAL,
    efficiency_rating DECIMAL
);
